description: Compact & Tangle-Free connect your iPod or iPhone to your car stereo, home stereo, portable speakers, sound card or any device that has a 3.5mm jack. The coiled cable prevents tangles and makes storage easy. Part of the MIXIT Collection Mix it up with chargers, cables, audio and power accessories that come in a full line of hi-tech hues: Pink/Red/Blue/Green/Purple
title: Belkin 6-Feet MIXIT Coiled Aux/Auxiliary Cable (Red)
